video_prompt: Futuristic city lights flicker and flow across skyscraper facades. Reflective surfaces ripple. Clouds drift, revealing a celestial body that slowly rotates, casting shifting light patterns. Atmospheric glow dynamically changes.
image_prompt: A futuristic, multi-tiered circular city floating above clouds, detailed with glowing golden and electric blue lights on dark metallic skyscrapers. A colossal, dusty-orange and blue planet dominates the deep blue, star-filled sky. A clear reflection of the city appears below. Warm horizon glow suggesting dawn or dusk.
refined_video_prompt: Futuristic city lights dynamically pulse and stream across skyscraper facades. Reflective surfaces shimmer and distort with ongoing movement. Clouds continually drift, parting to reveal a slowly rotating celestial body. Its rotation projects intricate, shifting light patterns across the scene as the atmospheric glow subtly yet continuously transforms.
